name: Connected Analytics Inc.
description: Operator of a store management platform designed to optimize store operations. The company's platform allows one to oversee business from anywhere using a mobile phone, enabling businesses to gain real-time insights into store activities, receive prompt stock replenishment alerts, and access profit and loss projections alongside detailed sales comparisons on a daily, weekly, and monthly basis.
one_liner: Operator of a store management platform designed to optimize store operations. The company's platform allows one to oversee business from anywhere using a mobile phone, enabling businesses to gain real-time insights into store activities, receive prompt stock replenishment alerts, and access profit and loss projections alongside detailed sales comparisons on a daily, weekly, and monthly basis.
